content: Hi there! Thanks for contacting XYZ Home Services. What’s your name so I can assist you with your electrical issue?
Thanks, Brian! Could you please provide your address so I can check if you’re in our service area?
Thanks! Let me check if your location is within our service area.
Hmm, I’m having a little trouble verifying your address and service area. I’m going to ask a team member to jump in and help you finish booking. Please hold on just a moment!
reason: Agent unable to verify address/service area, escalated to operator.

content: Hi Brian, this is Sarah from XYZ Home Services. Sorry for the wait! I see you’re looking for electrical help at 123 Oakview Drive. I’ve verified that you are in our service area. Can you tell me more about the electrical issue you’re having?
